<p>Sonos is <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=selling+a+bunch+of+its+speakers&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAa34-J7frfv77O6P6Z--gaurG5B88ZvrVndxgimoHUgq&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fstores%2Fpage%2F050D0847-3586-4701-9828-CFD8E4BF4A6B" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/050D0847-3586-4701-9828-CFD8E4BF4A6B?ingress=2&amp;visitId=4341197a-2a6c-4463-8025-f151a48d3101&amp;store_ref=bl_ast_dp_brandLogo_sto&amp;ref_=ast_bln">selling a bunch of its speakers</a> at a discount on <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Sonos;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=1e71dc69-0ad7-47e7-abf5-dc3926557fa3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Sonos&amp;linkText=its+own+site&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAdSZsJLD7dlzcYv5RGzTFPop-hwipUU4BjuzBSfNMqTj&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sonos.com%2Fen-us%2Fshop%2Fpromotional-offers" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.sonos.com/en-us/shop/promotional-offers">its own site</a> and Amazon. This includes the well-regarded Era 300 smart speaker, <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0BW28GFZ2&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=which+is+down+to+just+%24359&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1Nvbm9zLUVyYS0zMDAtV2lyZWxlc3MtU3BlYWtlci9kcC9CMEJXMjhHRloyL3JlZj1hc3Rfc3RvX2RwX3B1aXM_&amp;signature=AQAAAWNxDw4FYoJfMVXkclKwgJulRMl-ZRSCDRYcpwTPPoTH&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSonos-Era-300-Wireless-Speaker%2Fdp%2FB0BW28GFZ2%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sonos-Era-300-Wireless-Speaker/dp/B0BW28GFZ2/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1">which is down to just $359</a>. That's 20 percent off and notable because this particular speaker rarely goes on sale. It's a Sonos miracle!</p> 
<p>The deal applies to both the black and white colorways. The Era 300 is a highly capable device that we praised <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/sonos-era-300-review-a-big-bet-on-spatial-audio-130053487.html">in our official review</a>, saying that it "sounds excellent." We went on to say that it offers a premium experience that far surpasses other products in the company's lineup, like the Era 100. This is also true when compared to rival speakers like <a data-i13n="cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/apple-homepod-review-2nd-generation-140040630.html">Apple's HomePod</a>.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="a4f7e287bd1740deb1bcc3c8e4f35b52" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Sonos-Era-300-Wireless-Speaker/dp/B0BW28GFZ2/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>It's simple to set up and offers the company's proprietary Trueplay tuning system. This feature optimizes the sound of the speaker to the unique acoustics of a room by leveraging an internal microphone. It measures how sound reflects off surfaces and adjusts the EQ to match. It's pretty nifty.</p> 
<p>As for connectivity, it can pair with another Era 300 speaker for a true stereo experience. It also includes a Bluetooth receiver and line-in options. Of course, the speaker integrates with just about every streaming music service. The built-in mic also allows for voice assistant control, but only with Siri and Alexa. Google Assistant is left out of the party.</p> 
<p>This speaker goes all-in on spatial audio, and the results are mixed. Sometimes it's sublime and sometimes it's kind of eh. This is more of a dig on the technology itself. It has serious potential but is still experiencing growing pains. The only real downside of this speaker is the exorbitant asking price, which has been slightly alleviated by this sale.</p> 
<p>As previously mentioned, other Sonos products are available at a discount. This includes the Sonos Beam Gen 2 soundbar, <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B09GQ1CLTL&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=which+is+26+percent+off+at+%24369&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAUGeatPcvlCSwzmIZKbBSEGXGFlfk3Lo7VQzuLv03i2T&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSonos-Beam-Gen-2-White%2Fdp%2FB09GQ1CLTL%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sonos-Beam-Gen-2-White/dp/B09GQ1CLTL/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1">which is 26 percent off at $369</a>, and the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0BW34LCB8&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Era+100&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL1Nvbm9zLUVyYS0xMDAtV2lyZWxlc3MtU3BlYWtlci9kcC9CMEJXMzRMQ0I4L3JlZj1hc3Rfc3RvX2RwX3B1aXM_&amp;signature=AQAAAfpAtEmKEqR4Atcb62fwj2I2xpA9rZ7FLvZISAeEi19p&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSonos-Era-100-Wireless-Speaker%2Fdp%2FB0BW34LCB8%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sonos-Era-100-Wireless-Speaker/dp/B0BW34LCB8/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis">Era 100</a>, which is down to $179. These deals are also available via Sonos itself. There's also an ongoing sale on portable speakers that includes the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:8;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CGGJHZSM&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Move+2&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAcS5AmNTPSRYEwTV4r0jr-EmOG_96MEJduQMLDTBReFR&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSonos-Move-Wireless-Portable-Bluetooth%2Fdp%2FB0CGGJHZSM%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sonos-Move-Wireless-Portable-Bluetooth/dp/B0CGGJHZSM/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis">Move 2</a> and the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:9;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CY6TTR3C&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9e2ad85d-4566-4b0e-9bea-47aa096cf9c3&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Roam+2&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAbhg4Y9n4ckpzbSEtKM2IACB9cN2iNABusP2b-HoF-KM&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSonos-Roam-Portable-Waterproof-Bluetooth%2Fdp%2FB0CY6TTR3C%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sonos-Roam-Portable-Waterproof-Bluetooth/dp/B0CY6TTR3C/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis">Roam 2</a>.&nbsp;</p>
